ingredients.ingredient: ½ pound coarsely ground coffee beans

cookingTips: Use a coarse grind specifically for cold brew to prevent over-extraction and bitterness
Steep for 12-24 hours at room temperature or in the refrigerator for smoothest flavor
Store concentrate in the refrigerator for up to 2 weeks for convenience
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Explain the cold brew process and how steeping removes acidity and bitterness compared to hot brewing methods.
